content: this dragon egg amigurumi holds a surprise inside you can tuck away a crochet baby dragon in it for a fun treat with this free crochet pattern make the egg in all sort of colors and have it match the dragon features of the egg include dragon scales that go all the way around for a mysterious and fantasy look make a trio set and you too can become the mother of dragons this is a companion crochet pattern to my dragon amigurumi and part of my open mouth amigurumi series be sure to tag me with your projects on instagram 1 or facebook 2 i d love to see ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** intermediate **size ** approximately 5in/13cm tall **need to know ** crochet in the round single_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch increase and decrease assembly of parts 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan
